name.description:
The name of this package. This will become the directory link name in .upkg/.
A starting period (.), slashes (/), and newlines (\n) will be silently replaced with underscore (_)

dependencies.description: List of dependencies for this package. An array of objects.

relpath.description: A relative path without newlines or nulbytes

bin.description:
Paths relative to the package root to directories containing executables files or directly to executable files that should be linked to from .upkg/.bin (and /usr/local/bin or $HOME/.local/bin when installing globally).
Default: `[bin/]`

tar.description:
The path or URL to a tar archive
Required

sha256.description:
The SHA-256 checksum of the archive
Required

name.description:
A name override for the extracted archive directory.
This will become the directory link name in .upkg/ of the parent package.
A starting period (.), slashes (/), and newlines (\n) will be silently replaced with underscore (_).

Default: The basename of the path or URL

file.description:
The path or URL to a file
Required

sha256.description:
The SHA-256 checksum of the file
Required

name.description:
A name override for this file.
This will become the link name in .upkg/.
A starting period (.), slashes (/), and newlines (\n) will be silently replaced with underscore (_).
Default: The basename of the path or URL

bin.description: Set to [] to prevent the file from being linked to from .upkg/.bin (and /usr/local/bin or $HOME/.local/bin when installing globally), no other values are allowed.

file.description:
The path or URL to a file
Required

sha256.description:
The SHA-256 checksum of the file
Required

name.description:
A name override for this file.
This will become the link name in .upkg/.

Default: The basename of the path or URL

exec.description:
Whether the file should be made executable (chmod +x). `false` implies `bin=[]`
Default: `true`

git.description: The path or URL to a git repository

name.description:
A name override for the cloned repository.
This will become the directory link name in .upkg/.
A starting period (.), slashes (/), and newlines (\n) will be silently replaced with underscore (_).
Default: The basename of the path or URL

sha1.description:
The SHA-1 git commit hash to checkout
Required
